biotools.summary: MicrobiomeGWAS is a software package for identifying host genetic variants associated with micorbiome distance matrix or beta-diversity. For each SNP, microbiome GWAS tests the main effect or the SNP-environment interaction.

bioschemas.name: microbiomeGWAS
